description:
One day the left woke up and decided the masses must affirm indescribable feelings despite biological reality. And even though for all of human history men were men and women were women, progressives decided to change that. So while even cavemen were unconfused by this, the left still decided to trash the status quo.

In other words, they are the ones who started the culture war and society should never affirm that.

Sarah McBride, formerly known as Tim McBride, thinks Republicans are obsessed with him because he dresses like a woman. It’s unclear which Republican he’s talking about because I hardly doubt he crosses anyone's mind for more than a mere millisecond but don’t expect rational statements from someone who refuses to believe that sex is a thing.

Congr
title: Democrat rep who is a man pretending to be a woman claims Republicans are the "weird and bizarre" ones

description:

description:
No Doubt singer Gwen Stefani has turned hardcore MAGA, and her fans are outraged by it! There is no actual evidence that she is hardcore MAGA. Also, it's less her "fans," as much as a handful of random idiots on the Internet. But it's enough that left-wing tabloids who agree with those idiots are turning it into a thing, so let's talk about it.

We've seen this gameplan before with how lefties turned on Chris Pratt. Stefani has been speaking out about her faith in Christ and doesn't talk about how much she hates Donald Trump. The only thing political she has said of late is that celebrities should dial back on the politics. From there, it's basi
title: Gwen Stefani no doubt has her left-wing fans OUTRAGED over loving Jesus and this Tucker Carlson podcast she shared

description:
If JD Vance is the best decision Donald Trump ever made, Marco Rubio is rapidly cementing himself as a number two. The former "Little Marco" has been crushing it as Secretary of State and drops mics from here to Ukraine whenever he is asked anything about anything from anyone. Exhibit Q is his response to Mahmoud Khalil having his green card yeeted. Isn't this a free speech issue? Who does the Trump Admin think they are? The Biden Admin having pro-life grandmothers thrown in jail? Not quite, explains Rubio.

title: Marco Rubio throws down, explains Mahmoud Khalil "free speech" issue slow enough even your liberal friends will understand
